str2: On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: From phobos; to frighten, i.e. to be alarmed; by analogy, to be in awe of, i.e. Revere.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: From en and the base of trope; to invert, i.e. in a good sense, to respect; or in a bad one, to confound.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
